mapper.sql: name like CONCAT('%','a','%') or bookname like CONCAT('%','a','%')
mapper.select: select name,classes,bookname,borrowdate,createBy,updateDate,updateBy from ( select name,classes,bookname,borrowdate,createBy,updateDate,updateBy, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (order by id) as rowId from borrowlist where name like CONCAT('%','a','%') or bookname like CONCAT('%','a','%') ) as T where T.rowId < 5 *(1-1) and T.rowId >= 5 * 1;
